name: figma-admin-portal
description: Figma File Admin Portal for importing and exporting Figma files

scripts.dev:safe: npm run clean:ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend-only: npm run clean:backend-port && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend-only: npm run clean:frontend-port && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist .pids.json .running-processes.json .server.lock
